elements.text: You have always loved taking film photos of nature, especially birds. Lately, you've been feeling that you can't track birds as well as you used to due to issues with vision. You decide that you can photograph plants or trees instead of birds and realizing this makes you...

elements.name: Fun With Film_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
